div.div: Emory & Henry vs. East Tennessee State
at Johnson City, Tenn. | Kermit Tipton Stad.

tr.td: Coin toss won by E&H, ETSU to kick
Gray Mumpower kickoff 60 yards to the E&H05, T. Lightfoot return 17 yards to the E&H22 (Jack Jones; Chad Pritchard).
D. Dunnaville pass complete to Tyree Ward for 2 yards to the E&H24, out-of-bounds (Trey Quillin).
Kevin Saxton pass complete to Ashton Cline for 4 yards to the E&H28 (Austin Jackson).
Kevin Saxton pass incomplete to Kelman Simpson.
Chris Bingham punt 34 yards to the ETSU38, out-of-bounds.
